posts.raw_content:
All the sadistic glee we've seen from the left about this has been 2nd order violence. 

They've been trying very aggressively to incite physical reprisal against themselves so they can flip the narrative from leftist aggression to right wing aggression. Just like they used J6 to flip the narrative from months of extreme left wing violence to right wing violence.

The second one of theirs gets physical comeuppance, their media will pump out stories about it to flip the narrative.

This time the right is justified in wanting revenge, more than ever before, and there is no "two more weeks" bullshit to keep them temporarily quiescent. It's a real danger someone will lose it and exact blood for blood.

The mass firings satisfies that, without providing them anything to help them flip the narrative.

Genius.
